boardgame.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Wrath of the Righteous – Base Set
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Abyss awaits! When the city of Kenabres is destroyed by a horde of demons, only you can save the world! In Wrath of the Righteous, the epic new Adventure Path for the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game, you will travel to the Abyss to battle the malevolent minions of the demon lord Deskari. Along the way, you'll become mythic heroes that rival the greatest legends the world of Golarion has ever known. The saga begins in the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Wrath of the Righteous Base Set._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This cooperative strategy card game lets 1-4 players enter the hellish Worldwound. Choose from seven characters, each with a different style of play. Build a deck of powerful boons which will grow according to your desires as you advance in power by conquering challenges. Eventually, you'll gain a mythic card, which will allow you to warp the rules of the game and use the first-ever 20-sided die to appear in a Pathfinder Adventure Card Game release._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Wrath of the Righteous Base Set contains:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; More than 500 cards featuring a new set of boons for your characters to collect, and never before seen monsters and barriers of a decidedly abyssal nature._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Seven character classes, including the all-new arcanist, cavalier, inquisitor, and summoner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Worldwound Incursion Adventure Deck, a 110-card deck that begins the Wrath of the Righteous Adventure Path._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A complete set of six polyhedral dice, including the first d20 in the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Reserved for ordrune. All cards are in great condition, they were all played in sleeves. Includes Broken Token box organizer Character add-on deck Adventure decks 2, 3, 4. and 5. 3, 4 and 5 are still sealed Pig from hell promo Goblin skull bomb promo Temptation of Big Die Promo Sweet Dragon Costume Promo Chuffy Lickwound Promo Valais Durant Promo Improvised Dinosaur Promo Ekkie Promo Character Card Set $9.99 shipping to continental USA

Base game recently purchased and opened. Base game cards sorted. Dice still shrink wrapped, token sheet unpunched, and Adventure Deck 1 unopened. Overall like-new condition. Flat rate shipping is $15 within the continental US. Please see photos. Feel free to message me with any questions. Thanks for looking.
For geobaldi5 ONLY

For sale to user: Greg Mitchell (Nodecam) only. Sold via VFM 2015. To be delivered at BGG CON 2015.

Will ship to any location, buyer to pay actual shipping costs. Only played a few times. Cards have always been sleeved. The game comes with the Character add-on pack (these cards are mixed in with the others) and the first adventure pack. Price also includes the custom-made wooden insert (which is worth 15 pounds). There are a hundred or so extra cards that were slightly damaged when I received the game. I contacted Paizo and they sent me replacement cards for all of them. Would prefer a bank transfer, but will accept PayPal. Any questions? Please ask.

This listing is for the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Wrath of Righteous set. The listing includes: Base set Character Add-on deck Adventure Decks 2-6 The Base set, character add-on deck and adventure decks 2-3 have been sleeved with mayday penny sleeves which I will include. Decks 4-6 are still new in their boxes and are unopened. If you want to core game base set box, shipping will be $17 as it is large and heavy. There is no insert. Please note that USPS and UPS have both raised their prices this month. If you do not want the base set box, i can ship the game in long white card boxes and shipping will be $12.50. If you choose the long white boxes, the unopened adventure decks will be opened to fit in the box but each previously unopened deck will still be in its shrink wrap.

Opened and played once. Non-smoking environment. Great condition. Buyer pays shipping cost.
This also includes the character add-on deck, the 2nd adventure deck, Sword of Valor and the 4th adventure deck, The Midnight Isles.

New in shrink. Happy gaming!

English extensive use of text What you get: The base set, the add-on character pack, and the six adventure packs (each one with its promo card)! About the condition: the big box is okay; it was not pristine to begin with anyway. The seven packs are opened but present. The cards were not sleeved. The campaign was played once (39 plays for 36 scenarios) by component-loving adults, in a smoke-free, kid-free, food-on-the-table-free environment. All the cards are accounted for, and sorted back in their packs, so the campaign can be started with no fuss. Check out the other games I am selling!
